channel.title: Ancient Blueprints not working?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Ancient Blueprints not working?"

item.title: Re: Ancient Blueprints not working?
item.content:encoded: Ach! I'm an idiot. Thanks very much for your help.

item.title: Re: Ancient Blueprints not working?
item.content:encoded: (Locked) means that your Rune is below the "Don't let me touch anything below this" line in your item list.

item.title: Ancient Blueprints not working?
item.content:encoded:
So I'm probably missing something here, but I did the quest to get the ancient blueprints, and have it on my workshop page. I also have runes, but they say:

"1 Snake Rune You feel it wanting to combine with Six Wasteland Hides (Ancient Blueprints Required).. (Locked) "

Is there another step I'm missing here? Thanks in advance for any help.
